name: In | visible
description:
INFORMATION CONCERNING THE GASMASK

Several test has concluded that the gasmask summons a ██████████, █████████ and ████████████.
Test: GM-53 tested the ability to harm the ████.

Test subject had put on the mask then placed it on the floor in the origination point, waiting for it to come. 

10 minutes later an unnatural scream could be heard outside the door. 

Growning louder and louder. The door flew open and the test subject began firing at the ████ ████████. ████ blood all over from ████ shots, covering up the survailence cameras. The screams stopped.

Immidietly the emergency doors shut to try to keep the ████ at bay while getting personel out of the way. 

██ minutes pass, still no sound, one research team was sent out to investigate.

Camera was checked for live footage, directly after they left. The screen was a pale white face with scars and blood all over it presumably the creature. The ████ was climbing on the walls staring at the camera.
Conclusion if mask is worn, ████ will come after it's location. ████ like a beacon. Then monster will return the mask to it's original position.

Programmer: Isak Dalberg

Sound design: Oscar Nyberg

Music: Mathieu Keith
